question: Which Indian state/UT is set to conduct serological survey jointly with National Centre for Disease Control (NCDC)?
explanation:
As per the recent announcement from the Home Ministry, serological survey will be carried out in Delhi.
The national capital has seen a huge spike in the number of Covid-19 positive cases. The serological survey will be carried out jointly by National Centre for Disease Control (NCDC) and Delhi Government. Training on using Aarogya Setu & Itihaas apps will be given by NCDC trainers to the district teams.
